eng.start:
Welcome to the Port Scanner!

Use /set_ip [ip, ip1-ip2, domain_name, ip/mask...] to set scanning ip range

Use /set_port [port, port1-port2, service_name...] to specify port

Use /scan to start scanning

Use /settimeout [value] to set scanning timeout
eng.help:
Use /set_ip [ip, ip1-ip2, domain_name, ip/mask...] to set scanning ip range

Use /set_port [port, port1-port2, service_name...] to specify port

Use /scan to start scanning

Use /settimeout [value] to set scanning timeout
eng.exception_not_set: Please, set ip and port to scan
